pageContext.claim: “Will someone please explain to the Fake News New York Times (ALL THE NEWS THAT’S NOT FIT TO PRINT) that the Democrats make it almost impossible for us to fill positions within government. They ‘maximum’ delay even the best candidates, including Judges, leaving little time!”
pageContext.analysis: The Times reported on the long list of vacancies and acting officials at the Department of Homeland Security and other agencies tasked with responding to a national emergency. Trump blamed Democrats holding up nominations in the Senate, but that's misleading. Trump in many cases has simply declined to nominate officials for key posts, and has said repeatedly that he likes having "acting" officials.
